documentation.text:
@notice Emitted when a market item has been created succesfully
 @dev When a item is created, should show the item into the market

@notice This function will return the price of the item listed
 @dev It will returns a uint256 (price)

@notice This function will return the latest item listed in the ecommerce
 @dev It will returns a struct

@notice This function will return the items corresponding for the ID
 @dev It will look for into the struct MarketItem

@notice This function will return the current token
 @dev It will be a uint256

@notice This function will return all the NFT
 @dev It will look for into MarketItem struct

ItemListedSuccess(uint256,address,addres.details: When a item is created, should show the item into the market

createMarketItem(string,uint256).details: Using 3 functions, the first to from OZ and the last one written below

params.price: is the price that the user will create their item
params.tokenURI: is the URL that saves the Item metadata

getAllNFTs().details: It will look for into MarketItem struct

getListedItemForId(uint256).details: It will look for into the struct MarketItem

params.tokenId: is the tokenId of the listed item.

sale(uint256).details: Execute the sale with just the tokenId

params.tokenId: set the ID of the item to sale

params._listPrice: Is the price that the user wants to change their item

ItemListedSuccess(uint256,address,addres.notice: Emitted when a market item has been created succesfully

createMarketItem(string,uint256).notice: This function is to create a item into the ecommerce

getAllNFTs().notice: This function will return all the NFT

getCurrentToken().notice: This function will return the current token

getLatestIdToListedItem().notice: This function will return the latest item listed in the ecommerce

getListPrice().notice: This function will return the price of the item listed

getListedItemForId(uint256).notice: This function will return the items corresponding for the ID

removeMarketItem(uint256).notice: This function is to remove a listed item with tokenId

sale(uint256).notice: This function is to execute the sale
